Copyright Nobody, this was a shared experience.

To submit your guess, enter four numbers in the text fields that are supplied (each number will be 0-9), then click the Submit Guess button. The guess will then be evaluated and you will be presented with the results of how many numbers in the combination are correct and of those, how many are in the correct position. See below for examples.
 
Examples:
 MasterMind Number: 1-2-2-4
 Your Guess: 1-2-5-5
 Results in 2 numbers correct and 2 positions correct
 
 MasterMind Number: 1-4-5-6
 Guess: 7-7-1-9
 Results in 1 numbers correct and 0 positions correct
